text: The Canton of Bastia-6 (Furiani-Montésoro) is a former canton of the arrondissement of Bastia, in the Haute-Corse department, France. It was disbanded following the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. It consisted of 2 communes: *Bastia (partly) *Furiani Bastia-6 Canton 6 Category:2015 disestablishments in France Category:States and territories disestablished in 2015
title: Canton of Bastia-6
